Package ca.phon.phontalk

Class Xml2PhonConverter

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.phontalk.Xml2PhonConverter
public class Xml2PhonConverter
extends java.lang.Object
Reads in a talkbank XML file using SAX and JAXB. Converts the file into a PhonBank v1.1 file.
